name: Introduction to Classics
description: Overview of the study of the ancient Mediterranean world, including literature, history, religion, art, and archaeology.

name: Introduction to Ancient Greek
description: Introduction to the language of ancient Greece, including grammar, syntax, and vocabulary.

name: Introduction to Ancient Latin
description: Introduction to the language of ancient Rome, including grammar, syntax, and vocabulary.

name: Introduction to Ancient History
description: Overview of the civilizations of the ancient Mediterranean, including their literature, religion, politics, and art.

name: Ancient Greek Literature
description: Introduction to the literature of ancient Greece, including Homer, tragedy, comedy, and philosophy.

name: Ancient Roman Literature
description: Introduction to the literature of ancient Rome, including epic poetry, histories, orations, and satire.

name: Archaeology of the Ancient Mediterranean
description: Introduction to the archaeology of the ancient Mediterranean, including excavation techniques, cultural artifacts, and the interpretation of archaeological data.

name: History of the Ancient Mediterranean
description: Introduction to the history of the ancient Mediterranean, including political structures, wars, and major historical events.

name: Ancient Greek Religion
description: Introduction to the religion of ancient Greece, including the gods, myths, and cults.

name: Ancient Roman Religion
description: Introduction to the religion of ancient Rome, including the gods, myths, and cults.

name: Advanced Ancient Greek Literature
description: Introduction to advanced topics in ancient Greek literature, including the works of Homer, tragedy, comedy, and philosophy.

name: Advanced Ancient Roman Literature
description: Introduction to advanced topics in ancient Roman literature, including epic poetry, histories, orations, and satire.

name: Advanced Archaeology of the Ancient Mediterranean
description: Advanced topics in the archaeology of the ancient Mediterranean, including excavation techniques, cultural artifacts, and the interpretation of archaeological data.

name: Advanced History of the Ancient Mediterranean
description: Advanced topics in the history of the ancient Mediterranean, including political structures, wars, and major historical events.

name: Advanced Ancient Greek Religion
description: Advanced topics in the religion of ancient Greece, including the gods, myths, and cults.

name: Advanced Ancient Roman Religion
description: Advanced topics in the religion of ancient Rome, including the gods, myths, and cults.

name: Ancient History
description: Overview of the civilizations of the ancient Mediterranean, including their literature, religion, politics, and art.
prerequisites: Advanced Archaeology of the Ancient Mediterranean
Advanced History of the Ancient Mediterranean
